divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving along the beach at night and I saw over the ocean what I thought at first was a helicopter, but it made no noise and hovered a couple hundred feet off the water. I saw two lights on the craft. The front had a white light, the rear had a flashing red light. The lights seemed to be twisting around each other as it flew south. I got out of my car and ran to the beach and watched as it continued toward Palos Verdes. It became very small, very quickly and changed to a golden amber color. I know it could have been a military aircraft, but It just acted so strangely...
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Manhattan Beach
There were no other sightings in Manhattan Beach on or around June 23rd 2009
Summary: UFO seen over the ocean, close to shore...
